page.title: 20 MEG DODS GHOST OF PEEBLES
page.content: One morning at 10.30 a.m. Margaret Abbot was carrying a crate of milk up the stairs in the{Cross Keys Hotel. In front of her she saw a strange old women climbing the stairs. The lady was small and well built, with grey hair styled in a bun. She wore a black old fashioned skirt,with a cream coloured blouse and on her legs were black woollen stockings.She looked very strange when compared to other woman of our time. When Mrs Abbot asked other members of staff about the unusual lady,she received puzzled looks as the hotel had no female residents. It was then that they realised,she had seen the{ghost of Meg Dods.} Meg had been a landlady at the hotel who after she died had continued to watch over the place.
